SHR AddressUseVS ValueSet

How an address is used by the subject, for example, as a dwelling or as a mailing address.

name: SHR AddressUseVS ValueSet
title: SHR AddressUseVS ValueSet
publisher: The MITRE Corporation: Standard Health Record Collaborative
description: How an address is used by the subject, for example, as a dwelling or as a mailing address.

concept.display: The address at which a person dwells most frequently or maintains as his or her official premises.
An address at which a person dwells on a secondary basis, for example, during vacation periods, when residing with other parent or relative, at boarding school, etc.
An address temporarily used as a dwelling
Address (residence, postal, or work address) that is no longer in use
Address is a postal address, such as a PO box
Address of place of business where the subject is employed
